dcterms:creator: Emily Allaway
Kathleen McKeown
dcterms:description: The VAST dataset is a benchmark dataset for zero-shot stance detection, consisting of passages, topics, and their corresponding stances. It is designed to evaluate stance detection models on a variety of topics.
dcterms:title: VAST Dataset

dcterms:creator: Saif Mohammad
Svetlana Kiritchenko
Parinaz Sobhani
Xiaodan Zhu
Colin Cherry
dcterms:description: The SEM16t6 dataset is designed for detecting stance in tweets, containing labeled data for stance classification across various topics.
dcterms:title: SEM16t6 Dataset

dcterms:creator: Hans WA Hanley
Zakir Durumeric
dcterms:description: An unlabeled dataset of news articles covering a variety of topics, used to train topic-agnostic and topic-aware embeddings for stance detection.
dcterms:title: Unlabeled Dataset of News Articles

dcterms:creator: Emily Allaway
Kathleen McKeown
dcterms:description: The Augmented VAST dataset is an extension of the original VAST dataset, augmented with paraphrased versions of the original texts to increase the number of training examples.
dcterms:title: Augmented VAST Dataset

dcterms:creator: Hans WA Hanley
Zakir Durumeric
dcterms:description: The TAW dataset is a topic-aware dataset designed to create embeddings that capture the relationships between different topics in stance detection.
dcterms:title: TAW Dataset (Topic-Aware Dataset)
